document.full_text: 'you can etch it in stone,' satch sullinger said about his son jared's return to ohio state next year even though he is a projected first-round n.b.a. draft pick.
document.title: analysis: explaining sullinger's decision to stay
lines_and_colors: 'you can etch it in stone,' satch sullinger said about his son jared's return to ohio state next year even though he is a projected first-round n.b.a. draft pick.
